Service.name: Map a Planet 2 (MAP2)
Service.abstract_desc: MAP2 allows users to select global image mosaics of many of the planets of the Solar System. The mosaics can be map projected, clipped to extents, have algebraic functions applied to the image bands, and then converted to the desired file format.
Service.description: The PDS Cartography and Imaging Sciences Node at USGS provides the Map-A-Planet 2 (MAP2), an on-line tool for extracting science-ready, map-projected images from global mosaics. MAP2 stores the mosaics in a searchable data portal, users enter a mosaic selection and processing options that are executed on a local processing cluster using ISIS and the Geospatial Data Abstraction Library (GDAL). When the processing is complete, the user is notified by email to collect the product from the web site.
